meanings.definition: A person or animal that sprawls
meanings.sent1: The little toddler was a happy sprawler on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The cat is a lazy sprawler on the windowsill.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy turned into a cute little sprawler during nap time.
meanings.sent4: The tired worker transformed into a content sprawler on the couch after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The baby elephant was an adorable sprawler in the mud puddle.

meanings.definition: A plant that grows in a sprawling manner
meanings.sent1: The ivy is a green sprawler along the garden fence.
meanings.sent2: The pumpkin vine is a fast-growing sprawler in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The wildflowers turned into colorful sprawlers in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The grapevine became a fruitful sprawler along the trellis.
meanings.sent5: The strawberry plant was a sweet sprawler in the garden bed.
